name: Music and Imagination
description: An exploration of how music creatively reflects and inspires our sense of self, place and community. We consider various sites of musical imagination and the genres that intersect with them, including science fiction and fantasy literature, film, and video games.
prerequisites: ACMB01H3 and [VPMB82H3 or VPMB84H3] and [an additional 1.0 credit at the B-level in VPM courses]
